nodes.text: Camus IV was the fourth planet in the Camus system of the Illisurevimurasi sector, located within the Trans-Hydian portion of the Outer Rim Territories. Sometime prior to the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca once vacationed on Camus IV, but Solo became seasick while floating among the planet's ocean waves.
Camus IV was created for the 1998 young-readers story Star Wars Journal: Hero for Hire, written by Donna Tauscher.
The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Camus system, and therefore the planet itself, in grid square Q-4.
